channel.title: Docs on LaTeX tutorial
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on LaTeX tutorial

item.title: Getting Started with LaTeX
item.description: \(\) Installing the $\TeX$ software # To use $\LaTeX$, you will need access to a computer with $\LaTeX$ installed, or download and install a $\TeX$ distribution on your own computer. Your first $\LaTeX$ file # Create a new file below. You can name it anything you like, but it should be a .tex file. % helloworld.tex \documentclass{article} \begin{document} Hello, World! \end{document} Open a shell or cmd window, cd to the directory containing the file, and run xelatex on your file.
